comments: Row m=6 of the array A(5; m,n) := ((4*n+m)(!^4))/m(!^4), m >= 0, n >= 0.a(n) = A001813 a(n+2)/12. - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Feb 15 2008For n>4, a(n) mod n^2 = n*(n-2) if n is prime, otherwise 0. - _Gary Detlefs_, Apr 16 2012
